::DarkMouse::

She runs an stubmled through a grove of trees.  She keeps going, then 
suddenly the ground drops and she falls down a hillside.  Bumping 
into trees and rocks on the way down.  She gets back up and stumbles 
forward again trying to get away from the other bots.  She stops by a 
small stream and kneals down for a drink of cool water.  the water 
felt good doing down.  She took her paw and splashed some cool water 
on her face.  She heard noises behind her and got back up.  Still a 
little light headed, she kept going through the trees.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, crow_lord@h... wrote:
> Scopronok
> 
> 
>   Scopronok fired a missle off in the direction of the incoming 
fire. 
> "I'll send cyberbee after her." He says that as he launches 
CyberBee 
> after Darkmouse. He fires a rocket and a optic at the bushes as he 
> turns and runs after Darkmouse.
